website_summaries.verdict: This set of bold-colored gel polishes is for those who want to make a statement with eye-catching nails.
pros: could last up to 3 weeks with advised application method
Fun polish names that go on smoothly, cure quickly for shiny results
cons: Need LED curing lamp and base/top coat as a separate purchase for salon-like results
Some claim these are knock-offs/not salon quality

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop staring it my nails 😍
customer_reviews.text: Initially was disappointed by colors as the gel looks different when in the bottle, but as soon as I applied the color on my nails (used "Stand out") I couldn't be happier. Great color, easy application and, boy, my nails are so shiny. It's day 3 after application now and I still can't stop staring at them :)
customer_reviews.author: Masha K

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Just got this set. This is my first ever gel manicure. Never done it before for myself or for someone else. It was very easy to apply. I used two coats. I like that the color of gel looks uniform on the entire nail. All the colors matched the strip on the outside of the bottleI. I Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Salon quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is salon quality! First and foremost, this is such a good product. Smooth. Sleek. Shiny. Perfect color combinations for all seasons, all in one pack. I have tried other brands before with my led curing lamp, and NOTHING beats this brand. The pack came fairly quickly and I am more than satisfied with Amazon doing a fine job delivering it in perfect condition! If you want to save money on the polish, I reccomend buying packs like this one on Amazon to save you some money. Most MINI GELISH polishes are $13... FOR ONE.. HIGHLY RECCOMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea hazelett

customer_reviews.title: Totally cute!
customer_reviews.text: These nail polishes are absolutely beautiful. They work very well with the other Gelish nail polishes and from what I've seen they work with other gel brands as well. I have the to-go Gelish LED light that has a set time for 45 seconds and these nails polishes have worked well. The pink is a subtle bright color that I actually have grown to love. The red is a perfect red for holidays or everyday. The muted mauve is a beautiful color that'll match anyone. The deep purple is a nice and the light purple is a nice summer/fall color. I'm still looking forward to trying out the other colors but the quality of the nail polishes are very good.
customer_reviews.author: TP_0314

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time and the mini bottles are the perfect size to not take up too much space. The colors last a long time and are very vibrant. The only thing that I would be wary of, like another reviewer mentioned, is that the color on the bottle doesn't necessarily match the shade 100% when it's applied to the nail (most noticeable with Stand Out). Some might require a few thin layers to be opaque however, they still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great color combination
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color combination. It really gives you a little something for whatever mood you're in. I like to have options and didn't want 6 polishes all in one color family. So far the deep red color is my favorite but I think I'll try the teal one next!
customer_reviews.author: ZOE E SCHULER

customer_reviews.title: 2 Colors was swapped. Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Stand Out Gossip Girl Night Reflection Mint Icing Extra Plum Sauce I Or-Chid You Not Those 6 colors were expected, however, the Mint Icing and Extra Plum Sauce isn’t there. It got replaced with Sir Teal To You and Plum & Done colors.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyHatch

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set of colors! Han't purchased new colors in a while and I have been obsessed with Orchid you not. they have been lasting just as long as the brand I usually use and the colors go on nicely with 2 coats.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela1991

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. This is a top notch gel brand. Easy to use and not as thick and goopy as some brands. Will order more. Pricey, but you get what you pay for. Multiple coats needed.
customer_reviews.author: alina sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! Item is old and the consistency is very sticky. I have the light and still could not get this polish to work as designed!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible the nail polish dries off unevenly looking like there are parts of the nail with no color. And what you are able to get on the nail with 5 coats starts chipping about 3 days after manicure
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure of the authenticity
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use these polishes many times and they just don’t seem to work right. I am not sure if they were defective? I did not ask to return because I have used them multiple times. They almost seem too thin to be honest. I used about 5 coats of color and they peel away within days. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Norin

customer_reviews.title: Great Finish, Slightly different Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality polish. It seems to last about 2 weeks. I also got the gelish kit that has the phbond, base, topcoat, and cuticle oil. Before I put this on, I rub my nails w alcohol, then the phbond, then base coat and cure. These seem to need 2-3 coats, and the colors do seem to end up a little lighter than the bottle, but they are still nice. I think that's to be expected. I cure each coat, then a top coat, and then rub vigorously with alcohol soaked cotton ball to finish. Following those steps is important so they don't peel! :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: NOT normal Gelish quality
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT normal Gelish polish. Items arrive in an off-label package. They have a strong chemical smell, and pull away from the nailbed as soon as they are applied. I have been using Gelish polish for years without issue, and this is nowhere near the quality I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty

customer_reviews.title: Polish was not in good condition
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these colors, but the quality was disappointing. The polish itself looked weird, almost too thin and surely enough they all peeled off really easily.
customer_reviews.author: brian cahill

customer_reviews.title: Gelish always delivers
customer_reviews.text: So far, gelish is my favorite brand for gel colors. Longest lasting. Also high pigmentation, which means I don't need as many coats. The colors here are very true to the picture. The polishes are small, but when do you really go through your bottles anyway? I used these with red carpet base and top coats. My manicures can last about 3 weeks, but I prefer to change them every 2-2 1/2 weeks since they start looking grown out around that time.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The polish is not working. It looks runny and shrinks after curing. DO NOT PURCHASE! Waste of money! Threw in the trash! Unusable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Illsley

customer_reviews.title: I thought Id get the whole gel kit for her birthday and she absolutely loved it. Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this extra set of colors to go with an actual kit I bought for my girl friend. We made bets on who could go the longest without going to the nail shop. I thought Id get the whole gel kit for her birthday and she absolutely loved it. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Gelish rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This gel polish is AMAZING!!! The colors on the labeling do not represent the polish color, but it really is completely comparative to salon gels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal compared at $11 a bottle at Sally’s. The colors are exactly as pictured. The polish is easy to use and it lasts about two weeks before t starts to chip.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie K

customer_reviews.title: Dull colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not anywhere close to the richness in the picture. The green looks like a dark ivy color but after two layers is more like a light green, translucent color with a bit of glitter in it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Houck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color payoff!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I’ve used several brands of gel polish but they end up peeling in about a week or so. This gelish brand is used at my local nail salon and I decided buy the trio which included the pH bond, the “foundation and the “top it off.” I used these three along with these color gel polishes and the result is a long lasting tough exterior. I love these! I only used two coats of the color!
customer_reviews.author: Delia Arvayo

customer_reviews.title: The colors are not great
customer_reviews.text: there are only two colors that actually look good out of this whole set. The super dark purple that almost looks black and the orchid color. unfortunatley the teal needs like 5 coats, which then makes iteasy to peel off (its very opaque) and the pink and purple are super bright... not my style.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaRose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My favorite gel polish. Great colors. Purple and green are lighter than expected, but polish holds up great.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Wrong and defective order
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this as it was a really good deal. However, upon opening it, I discovered that one color was all goopy, thick, and the brush was ruined making it completely unusable. Then I discovered that the one color I mainly ordered this for (I or-chid you not) was replaced by another color that I would have never purchased on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent polish. Can be a little tricky to apply if you’re inexperienced. Make sure you use a PH bond, basecoat and topcoat. After you’re done it is very important to rub away sticky residue with rubbing alcohol (I use a sterile alcohol pads you get at the pharmacy).
customer_reviews.author: LuMo

customer_reviews.title: The Superior LED Polish
customer_reviews.text: I love Gelish. Who doesn't? It is the superior LED polish, never disappoints. Colors are always on trend, I get constant compliments on my nails. Buy Gelish and you will be happy! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing colors and price
customer_reviews.text: Great value pack of gel. I love gelish brand ! Can’t go wrong. Price is amazing !!! One of these bottles as Sally’s is $12 !!! So yea buy this instead
customer_reviews.author: Anais falcon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great deal. This size bottle of the same brand is $11.99 at Sally Beaty Supply. The colors are somewhat different than the bottle shows though. I don't love all of the colors but will probably use them all at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I only like 2 of the colors, but for the price and this many colors is a good deal. Mini's are perfect for doing your nails yourself, I like to change my colors often so I dont need a huge bottle.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Color descriptions inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars. Product itself is great!!! I use gelish all the time. But when I received my mini set two of the colors were not as in the description. Missing Mint icing and Extra Plum Sauce instead got sir teal to you and plum & done
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors! And what a deal with the multi pack!
customer_reviews.author: Kati S

customer_reviews.title: Lovely colors, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is very fast for this product! Had it in two days, when it said it would be a lot longer. Although I haven't tried it yet as I'm waiting for my Harmony 18g plus, I did open the bottles and the colors are brilliant. Labels don't do color justice.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love all of these colors. They go on smoothly and have a really nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Colors dont match
customer_reviews.text: It definitely lasts a long time, but the colors on the bottles do not match what you actually get. The colors also change over time. The pic attached is the plum after just applying on my middle finger, and the rest of the fingers is the same polish after a week and a half. Big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive any of the colors mentioned in the description of the product, the colors I received are not even close the ones in the picture, and the there’s no option for return it
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my daughter. She was thrilled. These are the only polishes she uses!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but took over month to get to me on PRIME.
customer_reviews.author: jen holt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These little bottles were exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Johnelle DenRuyter

customer_reviews.title: Great products, but one of the bottles was leaking.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great way to sample different colors. The only problem I had was that one bottle had not been sealed properly and it was leaking around the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick long.
customer_reviews.text: The polish din not last more than 3 days. I have re painted them and still the same. 1 start because the colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nyisha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs 2-3 coats to be opaque, but the colors are stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color difference
customer_reviews.text: Some of the polish colors are different in person and some are really similar to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Nina v

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: These are real gelish polishes. Colors are accurately represented. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: What I ordered and what I got was not the same. I ordered set of 6x gelish nail polish and I only got 4x. I was not happy with this purchase. It was quite dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: JeanB

customer_reviews.title: good 👍
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute, i love them, the only thing is that on the application the pink one generates like crumbs idk how to explain 😅
customer_reviews.author: Lilian L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors! Pretty and the price point cannot he beat.
customer_reviews.author: D-Roze

customer_reviews.title: Gelish is my #1 go to
customer_reviews.text: Gelish is the best polish I have found. I've tried many different brands and Gelish ranks above any other I've tried. The colors in this set are awesome and I felt like the price was a decent deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two colors arrived leaking badly
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. Unfortunately two out of the six colors had leaked badly in the package before I even opened the product. Therefore I lost the majority of those colors. Not worth the price if I only can use four out of the six colors.
customer_reviews.author: kerry-anne magee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it would hold up longer than it did. It started to loft and leak the next day.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my 5 years old daughter because regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 years old daughter because regular polish kept chipping off and i found myself painting nails all the time! She LOVES getting her mommy manicures from me
customer_reviews.author: Shellene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome colors
customer_reviews.text: Love these colors. I have ordered several sets from this company and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: desiree

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: These are Knock-off's. Nothing like I purchase at the professional beaity supply. I turned to Amazon because my local supplier seems to run out of the colors I want too quickly. I will say that the color did last, but when I applies the laquer on my clients, I noticed it was pulling away from the corner edges of the nail, despite how well I prepped them, etc. After comparing the bottles and labels to mine, they are not the same. I am a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: andrea pletcher barton

customer_reviews.title: Colors were perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The colors matched the description exactly. I have used 5 of the 6 colors so far and all have been fantastic! They cure well. They do go on a bit thin and took a few coats before I was happy but they look so beautiful that I don't really mind. The color lasts about a 7 days but I am really hard on my nails and so far I haven't used a single gel polish that lasted more than 7 days. In fact this is the first that made it a full 7 days I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Winship

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors! Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Just got these polishes in the mail today- I can’t wait to try them out! They came well packaged- 3 to a small box, inside a larger box filled with bubble wrap, inside a bag. And the polishes are so pretty! The really dark one is actually a beautiful dark purple, though it kinda looks black from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful variety of colors. I enjoy mini sets because you don't get married to a big bottle if you don't like it. So it's nice to have this option.
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly 3 weeks on the picture and my nails look great. Just make sure to prep and dehydrate the ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave my nails at least couple weeks before writing a review. Exactly 3 weeks on the picture and my nails look great. Just make sure to prep and dehydrate the nails before applying the gel. I used only Gelish products since they last the longest. The polish is so easy to apply, it almost fixed itself on your nails. Definitely buy more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Inga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I work a job that requires me to have conservative nail colors, so it's a waste for me to buy full-size bottles of "fun" colors for my toes or vacation times. These Mini sets allow me to have a lot of variety without a lot of cost. I'm thankful they exist!
customer_reviews.author: R Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Love the colors. I thought the one was black but it's actually purple so watch for that. They last long and the mini bottles are nice to have more variety
customer_reviews.author: KatelynTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, questionable colors
customer_reviews.text: Great value for me since I do my nails at home and rarely ever make it through a standard-sized gel nail polish. Some of these colors suck though, namely the wizard of oz green and the purple people eater colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: The best nail polish I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. The nail polish. Love gelish. Go on smooth and last a long time. Absolutely ❤️ love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and good quality. Not water and runny like some the full size ones I’ve bought. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love anything Gelish
customer_reviews.text: Love anything Gelish. I thought the mini size would be too small but they're great. It's a great way to try something new on a budget. Great coverage and great colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors don't match labels!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these. Two of the bottles are the dark green color, even though the one bottle is labeled the purple! The pink is okay, but the other colors just don't really match what is described here.
customer_reviews.author: EWB

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and these little bottles really have helped increase my collection without paying a lot for the big bottles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sampler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to sample different colors. These have great staying power - never an issue with early peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Pipi Gage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Have only used gelish brand products for my gel nails. Long lasting great quality
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Combs

customer_reviews.title: Selection of colors
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 grand daughters that love all the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for these to try out new colors, have gotten lots of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and arrived in just a few days
customer_reviews.author: terri k palmer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The colors are really thin an required multiple coats that lead to it peeling after 3 days
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic84

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These came nicely packaged and the pictures are true to color.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as stated, and very courteous and prompt service.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine B. Kelsch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: Cures well with my LED lamp. Two coats needed, vibrant colors, long lasting. A great value, perfect way to try out many colors.
customer_reviews.author: BeeSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful! They have a hint of shimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Danicakes9

customer_reviews.title: Colors ok. Shipping packaging no good.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are ok. The reason why I am giving it two stars was due to one of the polishes being open and leaked all over.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke W.

product_meta.title: Gelish Mini Midnight Caller Collection 9 mL Soak Off Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Pack
feature_bullets: NEW COLLECTION: Include 6 colors: Diva, Midnight Caller, Brights Have More Fun, No Cell? Oh Well!, Wanna Share a Tent?, and No Sudden Mauves
CURE UNDER LED OR UV LAMP: Soak-off gel polish is a 3-step system and will cure in 45 seconds under an LED lamp or 2 minutes under a UV lamp
LONG-LASTING MANI: Get a long-lasting manicure that will sparkle and shine for 21 days
SUPPORTS NAIL HEALTH: Provides a solid, healthy level of support for weak or damaged nails
FAST AND EASY TO APPLY: Easier and faster to apply than traditional acrylic polish
